description:
In this course you will learn how to strengthen your LinkedIn profile and how to use this social media tool to connect with influencers, new clients and potential business partners.

The strategies you will learn in this course with lead you to:

·Optimize your LinkedIn profile to get MAXIMUM results

·Promote your skills and abilities in a unique way

·Choose the profile settings that match your professional goals

·Use LinkedIn groups to create a top-notch network

·Transform LinkedIn into a powerful personal branding tool

·Increase your chances to connect with anyone on LinkedIn, including 3rd-level connections

·Adopt LinkedIn etiquette to maximize your chances of success

·Use advanced publishing techniques to become a LinkedIn influencer

·Decide whether LinkedIn Premium is a good fit for your career and business goals

·Learn quick tips to ensure your profile is secure

This course is not only about concepts. “LinkedIn Strategies for Career Success" is filled with execution so you can start harnessing the power of LinkedIn FAST!

******************************

“Although I'd been 'using' LinkedIn for many years, when I took Cloris's course I realized I'd barely scratched the surface of its potential. This course packs a powerfully effective punch. My social media life will never be the same again!"--Roz Savage, bestselling author of Start Drifting, Start Rowing, activist, speaker, and coach.

******************************

What's my story?

I used to think LinkedIn was a waste, but when I learned how to use this tool correctly, I realized I had missed many opportunities that would have made a huge difference in my career.

I don't want you to make the same mistake.

That's why I created this course.

I have experienced the benefits of having a strong LinkedIn network, and I know you want and deserve to experience this too!

This course reveals step-by-step strategies to supercharge your LinkedIn profile. Even if you just know the basics about LinkedIn, you'll be able to implement the strategies I share, and you will achieve tangible results that can significantly impact your career.

The course is dynamic, easy to follow, and streamlined.

Let me help you share your skills and abilities with the world. Make this small investment in your career and sign up today!

And remember to always reveal your magnificence!

Cloris

PS. Your investment is backed by Udemy's 30-day no-questions-asked guarantee.
title: LinkedIn Strategies for Career Success
